name: Bluff Post
author: Hideaki Oguchi

sections.description:
Bluff Post is send e-mail plugin. for e-mail magazine, e-mail promotion. Support for WordPress members Welcart customers & Woo Commerce customers(Beta compatible), subscribe members from widget.
You can deliver the mail magazine with a simple operation.

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/bluff-post directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the Settings->’Bluff Post’ screen to configure the plugin.
  4. Setting cron. see Settings->’Bluff Post’ – ‘Reservation’ – ‘CRON’
  5. Copy themes/blfpst-default/single-blfpst_mail.php to your theme directory.

  • WordPress 5.6 compatible.
  • Use Bootstrap4.
  • Fixed a bug that transmission does not start when the transmission start button is pressed repeatedly.
